text: Track Responses, Measure ROI of Print Campaigns

billingNote.monthly: Switch to annual billing and get 12 months for the price of 10 months.
billingNote.yearly: Enjoy more for less! Save more.

Monthly.title: FREE
features: Up to 50 Personalized mailer(Handwritten/Typed font)
Up to 50 handwritten address on #10 envelopes
Overage: 20c/mailer
View Name & Address of those who scanned QR code
Scan Validity: 1 month

Monthly.title: Starter
features: Up to 500 Personalized mailer(Handwritten/Typed font)
Up to 500 handwritten address on #10 envelopes
Overage: 10c/mailer
View Name & Address of those who scanned QR code
Scan Validity: 3 months
Download CSV of Names & Addresses of those who scanned QR code

Monthly.title: Grow
features: Up to 1000 Personalized mailer(Handwritten/Typed font)
Up to 1000 handwritten address on #10 envelopes
Overage: 8c/mailer
View Name & Address of those who scanned QR code
Scan Validity: 6 months
Download CSV of Names & Addresses of those who scanned QR code
Re-Target to those who DID NOT scan QR code by downloading CSV of Names & Addresses
Up to 5 members in a team
Address Validation

Monthly.title: Pro
features: Up to 2500 Personalized mailer(Handwritten/Typed font)
Up to 2500 handwritten address on #10 envelopes

Custom design your content for one time cost. Chat with support to get estimate
